name: Rolling in Circling Universes
description:
This is my submit for the extra credits jam #3, the theme was cycles. I didn't have much time to work on it, but I still really wanted to do something, so I decided to keep it simple.

You control a sphere using directional arrows and space for jump and you have to resist as long as possibile. The trick is that the camera is costantly switching cycling between three different positions.

Enjoy.

Assets used from the store:

Song from
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music...

Skybox from

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/star-nest-skybox-63726

Shader and material from
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/mk-g...
